column4: I have input coming in on my TV card. how can I view it on ubuntu?
different models have different components, driver requirements, and configurations
if it's an internal card put the output of lspci on pastey
could you install mplayer from the repos please
that may not be the right device though...
the device that w_scan reports is /dev/dvb/adapter0/frontend0
with "PVR" [encoder] device do not support MPEG input.
run "mplayer tv://dev/dvb/adapter0/frontend0" and see what that dows
it is output from an xbox, if that helps
